item.title: Golang gRPC Cloud Run
item.description: Google explained how to run gRPC servers with Cloud Run. The examples are good but only Python and Node.JS: gRPC comes to Cloud Run gRPC in Google Cloud Run Missing Golang…. until now ;-) I had problems with 1.14 and so I’m using 1.13. Project structure I’ll tidy up my repo but the code may be found: https://github.com/DazWilkin/Golang-gRPC-CloudRun tree -L 1 . ├── client ├── cloudbuild.yaml ├── deployment ├── go.
